title: Hey Riot, how bout you tell us how long
body: it takes one of your guys to change a color on a costume.  I'm really curious how you can justify charging 2 bucks a color.  You aren't Capcom BTW.

replies.body:
Because it takes likely no more than ten seconds of "work" to code swapping a color or two?

Because they've been saying for years that they are looking for more things for players to spend IP on?

Hey InsaneSamurai, how bout you tell us why

you think that you are entitled to content which doesn't affect the game you play for free?

Hi, generic troll #128260126.  If you're going to argue with someone for no reason, at least argue with someone who isn't asking for something that would help you.

I am not a troll. I am being completely serious. Why do you think you should get something **that doesn't affect gameplay in the slightest** for free? It isn't greedy - you don't need the chromas to play the game, having one doesn't help you win or make *playing* any more fun. I don't understand your mentality.
